column4: hey all.. i have a webcam and id like to use it for a video chat.. but linux doesnt seem to detect it.. well, it doesnt work in gnomemeeting anyway. Any idea of a solution?
is it a webcam that is supported in linux?  Do you have a driver for it, and is it loaded?
i have no idea if its supported and ill have a look for the driver and what do you mean is it loaded?
if you know the name of the module that supports it, you can lsmod | <modulename> to see if it's loaded
